Posts.Content: jenniferinchi wrote: I had a mammogram yesterday (screening) and I got a peek at the image on the screen where I saw several bright white spots.  Today the hospital called saying the radiologist has requested diagnostic testing to evaluate some thickening they want to take a closer look at and expect to be at the hospital for 2 hours.   What kind of tests should I expect?  I don't want to worry .. I just want to know what I'll encounter.   I'd love any insight.  Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What is involved in diagnostic testing? jenniferinchi LeahinTexas
